name: Rebolt
description: Rebolt is an AI platform that enables users to build enterprise apps and agents through natural language conversations, integrated with company tools and data.
longDescription: Rebolt is a cutting-edge platform designed to democratize AI development by allowing non-technical users to create custom AI-powered applications and agents simply by describing them in natural language. Its mission is to eliminate barriers to AI integration in businesses, replacing cumbersome no-code tools, spreadsheets, and manual processes with intuitive, conversation-based building. The platform serves users by automating repetitive tasks and workflows, boosting productivity across teams in enterprises. It solves problems like the need for specialized coding skills and complex integrations by providing seamless connections to company data, tools, and authentication systems. Ultimately, Rebolt empowers everyone in a company to innovate with AI, fostering a more efficient and automated work environment.
features: Build AI-powered apps and agents effortlessly by chatting with AI, making development accessible without coding expertise.
Integrate seamlessly with enterprise tools like OneDrive, SharePoint, Salesforce, Teams, Slack, and custom APIs for comprehensive functionality.
Incorporate company-specific knowledge and data to create personalized and relevant AI solutions.
Implement role-based access control using Azure groups and SCIM providers to ensure secure user permissions.
Utilize built-in database, file storage, cron jobs, and audit logs for robust and reliable app operations.
Maintain separate staging and production environments to test and deploy apps safely.
Access ready-to-use AI capabilities within apps without managing API keys or external setups.
Automate complex workflows by connecting to business data sources and custom integrations.
Employ a vibecoding approach for intuitive, conversation-driven app creation that feels natural.
Empower non-technical employees to develop effective AI agents that address specific business needs.
Support for building agentic IDE-like experiences for advanced AI-driven automation.

faqs.question: What is Rebolt?
faqs.answer: Rebolt is an AI platform that allows users to build custom apps and agents through natural language interactions, integrated with enterprise tools and data.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use Rebolt?
faqs.answer: No, Rebolt is designed for non-technical users; you can create apps by simply describing what you want in conversation with AI.

faqs.question: What integrations does Rebolt support?
faqs.answer: Rebolt integrates with tools like OneDrive, SharePoint, Salesforce, Teams, Slack, custom APIs, and more to enhance app functionality.

faqs.question: Is Rebolt secure for enterprise use?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features role-based access control, authentication integration, audit logs, and secure data handling for enterprise-grade security.

faqs.question: How much does Rebolt cost?
faqs.answer: Rebolt offers a free tier for exploring core features, with paid plans starting at around $20-25 per builder per month for additional usage and features.

faqs.question: Can Rebolt access my company's data?
faqs.answer: Yes, it securely integrates with your company tools and data sources to build context-aware apps and agents.

faqs.question: What kinds of apps can I build with Rebolt?
faqs.answer: You can build AI agents and applications for workflow automation, data processing, custom integrations, and more tailored to your business needs.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Rebolt provides a free tier that allows limited access to its core features for testing and exploration.

faqs.question: How does the app-building process work?
faqs.answer: Users describe their requirements in natural language, and the AI generates the app, automatically integrating mentioned tools and data.

faqs.question: Is Rebolt suitable for small teams or only large enterprises?
faqs.answer: Rebolt is scalable and suitable for companies of all sizes, from small teams to large enterprises, to quickly integrate AI.

faqs.question: What makes Rebolt different from other no-code tools?
faqs.answer: Unlike traditional no-code platforms, Rebolt uses conversational AI for building, focusing on agentic and integrated enterprise solutions.
